Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
Summary: came thur my back yard low to ground hovered then it went up and stayed in area got lots of pics
trends: There have been no other sightings in Bostic
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWhen I spotted it I was sitting in my back room I heard this humming noise and I thought it was the helicopter coming back thur the back of my yard again. When I stepped out my back door to look I had the shock of my life.I called 9-11 the police were dispatched.I was looking at I want to say A large round Sauser like thing that was shiney moving towards my house very slow it had lights that were going off and on Red Blue White and Green. I ran to find my camera in hopes to get a least one shot I was amazed that I was able to get alot of shots even though it would not stay still. I was so happy to get what I did. When the police arrived I was laughed at at first till I showed them the pictures. There is some kind of actitivty around here because I have seen this thing more than once but not up close like I did this time I had to zoom out to to get some of my pictures. so it looks like little spots but when inlarged you can see the shapes and lights.
